name: INTERSECTION ON BEHALF OF AERCAP
description: AerCap is the worlds largest owner of commercial aircraft and leader in aviation leasing
sampleDescriptions: Sought status updates on FAA certification delays impacting the conversion of Boeing 777 cargo planes into passenger planes, and OFAC license approvals related to settlements with foreign insurers
